version_description:
People say I’m the coldest raccoon in town, and this time they’re right, The NEW EPISODE Glacier Palace will send chills down your spine as you try to beat me…

… Which of course, will NOT happen. The 15 NEW LEVELS are far too hard for you, with or without an ice pick. 

Have fun trying though!

Some lil’ dog that goes by the name of Hunter told me you wanted a NEW EPISODE and NEW LEVELS. I’m not usually one to listen to anyone but myself, but thought you could do with some cheering up after I beat you last time. 

So here you have it, enjoy the new content in this update. And as always, good luck defeating me. You’re going to need it!

These NEW LEVELS might look all nice and pretty, but once the reality of me winning (again!) sets in, you’ll wish you never tried. 

Good luck, humans!

Roll up, roll up! The Vintage Circus has come to Farm Heroes Saga with 15 NEW LEVELS! 

Getting through this new NEW EPISODE is going to be a balancing act not for the faint hearted. We’ll definitely applaud you should you complete it! 

Good luck!

Getting through this new NEW EPISODE is going to be a balancing act not for the faint hearted. We’ll definitely applaud you should you complete it! 

Good luck!

Head to Steampunk Gardens in our brand NEW EPISODE, out now! 

You’ll have a Farmtastic good time in these in 15 NEW LEVELS. It’s an era of Farm Heroes Saga not to be missed! But be careful, Rancid the Raccoon is lurking around the corner as per usual…

Be sure to update the game for all the new content! 

Good luck!

Oh, so you think you’re getting ahead of me do you? There’s no chance of that in the NEW EPISODE, Arabian Bazaar. 

In these 15 NEW LEVELS, skill is required. Yes, that’s right, skill! No amount of bartering is going to help you out this time, suckers! 

Bring it!

An apple a day keeps Rancid away… Or something like that, so they say?! Well, fat chance of that happening in this new update!  

Play the NEW EPISODE Apple Orchard, and you’ll come across 15 NEW LEVELS and Rancid the Raccoon. Have you got the skills to defeat him?

Good luck!

A new update has arrived so be prepared as we’re taking you on a journey to the Mongolian Steppe! 

In this episode you’ll tackle 15 NEW LEVELS. Of course, Rancid the Raccoon is lurking about the corner, but we’re pretty sure you have the skills to defeat him. 

Be sure to update Farm Heroes Saga for all the new content! 

Good luck!

Super-Hunter is wearing his (HERO)RED cape and he’s onto an amazing mission! 
 
Farm Heroes Saga, Apple, and (RED) are working together to help create an AIDS-free generation. 

Your actions matter. 100% of the proceeds from your (HUNTER’S PACK)RED purchase goes to the Global Fund to support HIV/AIDS prevention, treatment, counseling, and testing in sub-Saharan Africa.
 
Join by playing 12 NEW LEVELS in our (FIREWORKS)RED event for a limited time. A little play can make a BIG difference.

Want some rewards for taking care of the Farm? Of course you do! But we haven’t made it that easy for you...

Complete a series of QUESTS and you’ll earn Farmtastic rewards. You can then use them to pass those tricky levels and defeat that pesky raccoon!
